header.title: SVG/JPEG Serializer
header.abstract: This document describes the svg/jpeg serializer of Cocoon.

s1.title: SVG/JPEG Serializer
s1.p: The SVG/JPEG serializes an xml svg document to a jpeg image. The serialization uses the Batik's JPEGTranscoder internally.

s2.title: Sitemap Configuration
s2.p: A minimal sitemap configuration snippet declaring the svg2jpeg serializer:
A sitemap pipeline snippet using the svg2jpeg serializer:
In the declaration section of the svg2jpeg a number of parameters can be specified. The following snippet set the background color explicitly:
s2.source: <map:serializers.. <map:serializer name="svg2jpeg" src="org.apache.cocoon.serialization.SVGSerializer" mime-type="image/jpeg" logger="sitemap.serializer.svg2jpeg" > <parameter name="background_color" type="color" value="#ff00ff"/> </map:serializer>

s2.title: JPEGTranscoder Parameters
s2.p: General ImageTranscoder parameters are described at the SVG Serializer user documentation.
The following section presents JPEGTranscoder specific parameters configurable for the JPEGTranscoder.

tr.td: Specifies the JPEG quality as value between 0.0 and 1.0, 1.0 specifies highest quality. Usually a value of 0.9 is choosen.

s2.title: Further Reading
s2.p: Further details about JPEGTranscoder, ImageTranscoder is available at Batik.
